mapper.select: select *,(select count(*) from follows where tid=#{id} and type="collect") as collects from posts where id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into posts (title, content, tag, uid, pid, createTime, updateTime,pv) values (#{title}, #{content}, #{tag}, #{uid}, #{pid}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime},0)
mapper.update: update posts set title=#{title}, content=#{content}, tag=#{tag}, pid=#{pid}, updateTime=#{updateTime} where id = #{id}
update posts set pv=#{pv} where id = #{pid}
